text: Upon enrollment in credit builder program my entire account was reset as if I am a new customer. The only reason for me enrolling was have my instacash payments posted to my credit report. Now I don't have access to the credit I truly deserve, because of account reset my direct deposit history is gone so therefore I don't have access to higher instacash limit. Basically Screwed over for a 1160 that I don't get to use. Is it really a loan??? Sounds suspicious this is a preditory service at best.

text: I’ve used money lion for two pay periods now. It’s very easy and so far everything has been great. The only thing I don’t like so far is that you can’t  withdraw all of your balance at once. I’ve had to do three separate “instacash” to get my full amount. Which means I pay a separate fee & tip each time.
title: Fees

reply.message: Hi there, Jennifer. Thank you so much for this awesome 5-star review! We're happy to know that our 0% APR InstaCash was able to provide assistance to you! Additionally, we designed Instacash to help you access smaller amounts of cash in a pinch, such as for an unexpected late fee or a can't-miss date night and we designed it to be easy to payback! It isn't meant to be a way to fund your larger expenses. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in maximum increments of $50. We appreciate your feedback regarding InstaCash so that we can continue to improve our products and services. It’s members like you that help makes MoneyLion ROAR! Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub? text: Run! This is not a good financial institution. The app is consistently broken and it’s very hard to get someone on the phone, not to mention the inaccurate credit reporting. I took out a “credit builder plus” loan and my monthly payments were never reported. It wasn’t until the app’s payment system went down for a week that they reported a missed payment! After going back and forth, they refused to update the credit reporting and stated I should have notified them (and waited on hold for 45 mins) that the system was down.
title: Run for the hills

text:
I would rate 0 stars if allowed.
This is the worst experience I've ever had banking. Moneylion has successfully created extreme financial hardship and continues to play the " there's nothing i can do " card. 
I decided to take advantage of the credit builder plus loan offer. I have always been able to make my membership payment via debit card for my moneylion checking account with no issues until recently when they said its no longer allowed. I only have 1 bank and that's with moneylion. In the past customer service has been able to process the member payments for me when I had issues using features like instacash. Now however they tell me that they aren't able to.
The major problem I have started on Oct. 1st 
When I called in and paid off my credit builder plus loan. The lady I spoke to assured me that once my payment processed that my loan would immediately be deposited into my roar account. 
That didn't happen, instead the following week when I still didn't have the loan I called and was told it was being held due to a missed membership payment in June. Keep in mind its October and I've been able to use features like Instacash consistently every 2 weeks with no problems. How is there a missed payment in June all of a sudden.  I try to pay it using my roar account and it doesn't work. They say they sent in a service ticket and should be fixed in 1-3 days.  It wasn't. I've contacted moneylion support over 15 times in a span of a week and was told that they don't have a time frame to when this problem will be fixed and no time frame to when my loan will be released to me. 
I am now 13 days behind on rent and a car payment,  there's no customer service there's never anyone with any knowledge or authority to speak to.  Moneylion has done nothing to fix this problem or offered any type of solution. All i get is more lies, misinformation and continued worsening my financial situation. 
My loan is paid in full. I have money in my roar account to pay the random June membership payment. Yet NO ONE has the ability to process the payment and release my funds.  
Absolutely no care for customers
Absolutely no regard for damages they cause 
Absolutely no sense of urgency to resolve this.

Yeah great send me the link to the complaint form that I've already filled out twice, claim you'll contact me directly.  When? Next week. Or do I need to file 3 before I get service? Can't locate my account.  Thats a load of bs. My email is linked to my account.  You see my full name.   Pathetic excuses.
title: I would rate 0 stars if allowed.
